title: Taliban Morality Ministry Dismisses Over 280 Men For Failure To Grow Beards
content: The Taliban's morality ministry has dismissed more than 280 members of the security force for failure to grow a beard and have detained more than 13,000 people in Afghanistan for "immoral acts" in the past year, officials said on Tuesday.
summary: The Taliban's morality ministry has dismissed more than 280 members of the security force for failure to grow a beard and have detained more than 13,000 people in Afghanistan for "immoral acts" in the past year, officials said on Tuesday.

title: Another Complaint Filed Against Sheikh Hasina In Bangladesh
content: The complaint accused Hasina and 23 others of committing crimes against humanity and genocide during a Hefajat-e-Islam rally at Motijheel's Shapla Chattar on May 5, 2013.
summary: The complaint accused Hasina and 23 others of committing crimes against humanity and genocide during a Hefajat-e-Islam rally at Motijheel's Shapla Chattar on May 5, 2013.

title: Search On To Find UK Tech Tycoon, Morgan Stanley Chief After Yacht Sinks
content: Divers scoured the wreck of a luxury yacht off Sicily's coast on Tuesday to find six missing people, including British tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch and a Morgan Stanley executive, following an intense storm that sank the vessel on Monday.
summary: Divers scoured the wreck of a luxury yacht off Sicily's coast on Tuesday to find six missing people, including British tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch and a Morgan Stanley executive, following an intense storm that sank the vessel on Monday.

title: Russia Announces Seizure Of Key East Ukraine Hub New York
content: Russian forces said Tuesday they had captured the key hub of New York in eastern Ukraine, as Moscow -- under pressure by a Kyiv counterattack on its territory -- presses on with its offensive.
summary: Russian forces said Tuesday they had captured the key hub of New York in eastern Ukraine, as Moscow -- under pressure by a Kyiv counterattack on its territory -- presses on with its offensive.

title: "Fell Asleep At His Own Trial": Hillary Clinton Mocks Donald Trump
content: Former Democratic Presidential nominee Hillary Clinton spoke Monday at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago and made a scathing attack on former US President Donald Trump, saying that the Democrats now have 'him on the run'.
summary: Former Democratic Presidential nominee Hillary Clinton spoke Monday at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago and made a scathing attack on former US President Donald Trump, saying that the Democrats now have 'him on the run'.

title: German Court Upholds Murder Conviction Of 99-Year-Old Ex-Nazi Camp Worker
content: The German Federal Court upheld a 99-year-old woman's conviction for accessory to murder over her role as a typist at a Nazi concentration camp in the last two years of World War Two.
summary: The German Federal Court upheld a 99-year-old woman's conviction for accessory to murder over her role as a typist at a Nazi concentration camp in the last two years of World War Two.

title: Pakistan Conducts Training Launch Of Shaheen-II Ballistic Missile
content: The Pakistani military on Tuesday conducted the successful training launch of its surface-to-surface ballistic missile Shaheen-II, the army said.
summary: The Pakistani military on Tuesday conducted the successful training launch of its surface-to-surface ballistic missile Shaheen-II, the army said.

title: Barack Obama Set To Hail Kamala Harris As Future Of Democratic Party
content: Barack Obama will hail Kamala Harris as the future of the Democratic Party on Tuesday as she is formally crowned its presidential nominee after a roller-coaster ride in US campaign politics.
summary: Barack Obama will hail Kamala Harris as the future of the Democratic Party on Tuesday as she is formally crowned its presidential nominee after a roller-coaster ride in US campaign politics.

title: Israeli Military Retrieves Bodies Of 6 Hostages From Gaza
content: Israel retrieved the bodies of six hostages from the Khan Younis area in southern Gaza, the military said on Tuesday, as negotiations continued in an effort to bring back more than 100 who remain in the besieged enclave.
summary: Israel retrieved the bodies of six hostages from the Khan Younis area in southern Gaza, the military said on Tuesday, as negotiations continued in an effort to bring back more than 100 who remain in the besieged enclave.

title: Israeli Strike Kills 7 In Gaza School, Allegedly A "Hamas Command Centre"
content: Gaza's civil defence agency said an Israeli strike hit a school in Gaza City on Tuesday, killing at least seven people, while the Israeli military said it struck a Hamas command centre.
summary: Gaza's civil defence agency said an Israeli strike hit a school in Gaza City on Tuesday, killing at least seven people, while the Israeli military said it struck a Hamas command centre.

title: "Need To Explore Many Areas Further": Malaysian PM Calls PM Modi "Brother"
content: Calling Prime Minister Narendra Modi his brother, Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim, who is on a State visit to India, that there are many areas Malaysia and India are required to explore further.
summary: Calling Prime Minister Narendra Modi his brother, Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim, who is on a State visit to India, that there are many areas Malaysia and India are required to explore further.

title: As Overtourism Wanes, Japan Removes Barrier At Mount Fuji Photo Spot
content: A barrier erected in Japan to block a popular view of Mount Fuji has been taken down -- for now -- after succeeding in discouraging unruly tourists, a town official said Tuesday.
summary: A barrier erected in Japan to block a popular view of Mount Fuji has been taken down -- for now -- after succeeding in discouraging unruly tourists, a town official said Tuesday.

title: Mpox Is Not The New Covid, Says WHO
content: A World Health Organization official stressed on Tuesday that mpox, regardless of whether it is the new or old strain, is not the new COVID, as authorities know how to control its spread.
summary: A World Health Organization official stressed on Tuesday that mpox, regardless of whether it is the new or old strain, is not the new COVID, as authorities know how to control its spread.

title: 'Kill Bill', 'Reservoir Dogs' Actor Michael Madsen Arrested For Assault
content: Actor Michael Madsen, known for his work in Quentin Tarantino films such as 'Kill Bill 1', 'Kill Bill 2' and 'Reservoir Dogs', was arrested in Malibu on charges of domestic battery following "a disagreement between" him and his wife, DeAnna Madsen.
summary: Actor Michael Madsen, known for his work in Quentin Tarantino films such as 'Kill Bill 1', 'Kill Bill 2' and 'Reservoir Dogs', was arrested in Malibu on charges of domestic battery following "a disagreement between" him and his wife, DeAnna Madsen.

title: Zara Removes "Sexually Suggestive" Children's T-Shirt After Complaints
content: "I'm so shocked. 'Take a bite,' is it just me? Or is this just not OK? I would never have my girls in this T-shirt," she added.
summary: "I'm so shocked. 'Take a bite,' is it just me? Or is this just not OK? I would never have my girls in this T-shirt," she added.

title: Antony Blinken Heads To Egypt After Israel To Push For Gaza Ceasefire
content: Top US diplomat Antony Blinken was due to travel to Egypt on Tuesday for talks on a Gaza ceasefire after saying Israel had accepted a US "bridging proposal" for a deal and urging Hamas to do the same.
summary: Top US diplomat Antony Blinken was due to travel to Egypt on Tuesday for talks on a Gaza ceasefire after saying Israel had accepted a US "bridging proposal" for a deal and urging Hamas to do the same.

title: Elon Musk Says 1st Supermoon Of 2024, Also A Blue Moon, "Looks Amazing"
content: Billionaire Elon Musk today called the first supermoon of 2024, 'amazing' to see.
summary: Billionaire Elon Musk today called the first supermoon of 2024, 'amazing' to see.

title: Google Criticised For Forcing Influencers To Prefer Pixel Phone Over Others
content: This new clause did not sit well with the digital creators who viewed it as an effort by the company to get positive reviews under the guise of sponsored content.
summary: This new clause did not sit well with the digital creators who viewed it as an effort by the company to get positive reviews under the guise of sponsored content.

title: Elon Musk's Cryptic Gun Emoji Post As Joe Biden Speaks On Violence In US
content: Billionaire Elon Musk today put up a cryptic gun emoji post on his social media platform X, shortly after President Joe Biden spoke on the rising gun violence in the US.
summary: Billionaire Elon Musk today put up a cryptic gun emoji post on his social media platform X, shortly after President Joe Biden spoke on the rising gun violence in the US.

title: "Who Does He Think He Is?" Joe Biden Blasts Donald Trump In Fiery Speech
content: In a charged and emotional farewell speech at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago, President Joe Biden delivered a scathing critique of former President Donald Trump, labelling him a "loser" and vigorously defending his own legacy.
summary: In a charged and emotional farewell speech at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago, President Joe Biden delivered a scathing critique of former President Donald Trump, labelling him a "loser" and vigorously defending his own legacy.
